import React from'react';import{attachUniversalProps}from'./helpers/universal-props';/**
 * <Button />
 * 
 * Regular HTML button
 * 
 * ```jsx
 * <Button
 *   primary
 * >
 *  Hi, I'm a primary button! ðŸŽ‰
 * </Button>
 * ```
 */function Button(props){var classNames=['alegrify-button'];classNames.push(props.className);if(props.primary){classNames.push('alegrify-button--primary');}if(props.destructive){classNames.push('alegrify-button--destructive');}if(props.full){classNames.push('alegrify-button--full');}if(props.small){classNames.push('alegrify-button--small');}if(props.large){classNames.push('alegrify-button--large');}return React.createElement("button",{className:classNames.join(' '),type:props.type||'submit',disabled:props.disabled,onClick:props.onClick},props.children);}Button.defaultProps={primary:false,full:false,small:false,large:false,type:'submit',disabled:false};export default attachUniversalProps(Button);Button.__docgenInfo={"description":"<Button />\n\nRegular HTML button\n\n```jsx\n<Button\n  primary\n>\n Hi, I'm a primary button! \uD83C\uDF89\n</Button>\n```","methods":[],"displayName":"Button","props":{"primary":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is this a primary button?"},"full":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is this a full width button?"},"small":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is this a small variant button?"},"large":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is this a large variant button?"},"type":{"defaultValue":{"value":"'submit'","computed":false},"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"button|submit"},"disabled":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Disabled?"},"children":{"type":{"name":"union","value":[{"name":"arrayOf","value":{"name":"node"}},{"name":"node"}]},"required":true,"description":"Button text / button content"},"className":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"Additional classnames"},"destructive":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is this a destructive button?"},"onClick":{"type":{"name":"func"},"required":false,"description":"Click action"}}};
